name: Stroke (Een)
description:
Fight your friends in Stroke; A free to play, multiplayer game that takes place in space. Stroke is a FFA KOTH game where the objective is to; hold the middle of the map to gain points, kill players for points, and dodge incoming fire to prevent being sent to the edges of the map.

Controls

WASD applies force to the corresponding parts of your character — Keep in mind that there is no gravity, so the time it takes to accelerate is the same amount of time it takes to decelerate.

Pressing Left-Click shoots in the direction of your mouse pointer.

Holding Right-Click shoots projectiles in rapid succession in the opposite direction of your mouse pointer. This is an ability that allows the player to shoot bullets much faster than they could normally, be careful, this ability uses x2 times as much ammo.
